    Subclasses of BloomFilter in org.infinispan.commons.util
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    MurmurHash3BloomFilter
    BloomFilter implementation that allows for up to 10 hash functions all using MurmurHash3 with different seeds.
